dsp
Class SignalEventBuffer

java.lang.Object
  dsp.SignalEventBuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SignalListener
public class SignalEventBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SignalListener

The SignalEventBuffer is the part bedween the Input and the TraceCanvas It receive and buffers the samples from the input. The TraceCanvas get the samples with polling. This class is a part of the Project "RLC-Messbruecke fuer 5 Franken" University of Applied Sciences Lucerne - Switzerland

Author:
Martin Klaper & Christian Kohler & Joël Gruber
